timeline.message: Feat(Provider): Move provider package from src/main to its own sub-project
Chore(Provider): Move independent blackduck tests to the provider sub-project
Fix(Provider): Refactor provider package names to be singular

timeline.bodyText: I guess I don't understand our uses of final. Do we prefer member objects be final?
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Yes. It's also part of our Integration_OSS_Formatting thing which is why these were automatically added when the file was modified.
replies.author: gkillough
